entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Otterburn Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 40%
